item.title: 反思对特朗普关税的最坏担忧
item.description: 在美国大选后的两周时间里，世界各国领导人和主要投资者一直在猜测，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普是否会完全兑现他在竞选时发出的征收普遍关税的威胁。【原文：World leaders and major investors have spent the two weeks since the US election wondering whether President-elect Donald Trump will follow through fully on his campaign threats to impose universal tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲股市以历史性优势输给美国股市
item.description: 很多金融大师都会说，分散投资的好处意味着你应该把大部分投资放在美国以外的地方。但多年来，选择欧洲（这里有沉寂的股市、脆弱的货币、危机四伏的政治体制和停滞不前的经济）一直是一个亏损的交易。唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的减税和监管计划使美股更具吸引力，而欧洲则面临着对其最大公司征收新关税的问题，并有可能在今年年底之前对美国股市征收新的关税。【原文：Plenty of finance gurus will argue the benefits of diversification mean that you should put a chunk of your investments outside the US. But for years, choosing Europe — home to a dormant stock market, brittle currency, crisis-ridden political system and stagnant economy — has been a losing trade.Now those problems may get worse. Donald Trump's plans to cut taxes and gut regulation is making US stocks more attractive, and Europe faces new tariffs against its biggest companies and the prospect of】

item.title: 澳大利亚称养老金必须为退休潮做好准备
item.description: 澳大利亚政府正在提议对该国 3.9 万亿澳元（2.5 万亿美元）的养老金行业进行一系列改革，以便为未来十年约 250 万人的退休做好准备。【原文：The Australian government is proposing a raft of changes for the nation’s A$3.9 trillion ($2.5 trillion) pension industry, to prepare for the retirement of an estimated 2.5 million people over the next decade.】

item.title: 华尔街头号警察计划在特朗普上台前辞职
item.description: 美国曼哈顿最高检察官私下告诉人们，他将在唐纳德-特朗普 1 月份就职前卸任，这标志着他积极起诉华尔街犯罪的任期结束。【原文：The top US prosecutor in Manhattan has privately told people he’ll step down before Donald Trump is inaugurated in January, marking the end of his tenure aggressively prosecuting crimes across Wall Street.】

item.title: Amer Sports 第三季度销售额因中国市场超出预期
item.description: Amer Sports Inc. 公布的第三季度盈利超过了分析师的预期，表明这家芬兰体育用品制造商有望实现甚至超过其全年财务预期。【原文：Amer Sports Inc. reported third-quarter earnings that beat analysts’ estimate, indicating that the Finnish sports goods maker is on track to meet or even surpass its full-year financial outlook.】

item.title: 二十国集团会议召开之际，俄乌战争紧张局势加剧
item.description: 11 月 18 日，在巴西里约热内卢举行的二十国集团领导人峰会期间，与会者在现代艺术博物馆外。摄影师：Dado Galdieri/Bloomberg【原文：Attendees outside the Museum of Modern Art during the G-20 Leaders' Summit in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on Nov. 18. Photographer: Dado Galdieri/Bloomberg】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利表示，雇主税率上升需要逐步降低税率
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，英国政府提高雇主税率的举措意味着英国央行在监测对经济的影响时将不得不采取谨慎的态度来放宽借贷成本。【原文：The UK government’s move to raise taxes on employers means the Bank of England will have to take a cautious approach in easing borrowing costs as it monitors the effect on the economy, BOE Governor Andrew Bailey said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对特朗普政策的观望态度与 2016 年截然不同
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，他希望先观望即将上任的特朗普政府将实施哪些政策，然后再由央行预测其对经济的影响。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell says he wants to wait and see what policies the incoming Trump administration will implement before the central bank forecasts what it means for the economy.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉离岸汇率跳涨，交易商削减套利敞口
item.description: 由于交易商在货币贬值的情况下退出了部分所谓的套利头寸，离岸市场隔夜拆借土耳其里拉的成本自 9 月初以来首次飙升至 50%以上。【原文：The cost of borrowing Turkish liras overnight in the offshore market spiked above 50% for the first time since early September as traders exited some of their so-called carry positions amid currency losses.】

item.title: 德国国防部长认为波罗的海地区电缆破损是破坏行为
item.description: 德国国防部长鲍里斯-皮斯托瑞斯（Boris Pistorius）说，波罗的海的两条海底数据电缆遭到破坏，必须作为破坏行为进行调查，并指出俄罗斯对欧盟构成了混合和军事威胁。【原文：German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius said damage to two undersea data cables in the Baltic Sea has to be investigated as an act of sabotage, pointing to Russia as posing a hybrid and military threat to the European Union.】

item.title: 印度通讯社起诉 OpenAI 侵犯版权内容
item.description: 印度最大的新闻机构之一亚洲国际新闻社（Asian News International）在印度一家法院起诉 OpenAI，指控这家美国人工智能公司滥用其拥有版权的新闻内容。【原文：Asian News International, one of India’s largest news agencies, sued OpenAI in a court in India alleging that the US artificial intelligence company misused its copyrighted news content.】

item.title: 乌克兰警告印度俄罗斯贸易将危及西方关系
item.description: 乌克兰警告新德里说，俄罗斯公司正在印度设立幌子以规避美国制裁，这一事态发展可能会损害印度与西方伙伴的关系，因为西方伙伴担心技术和武器落入莫斯科之手。【原文：Ukraine warned New Delhi that Russian firms are setting up fronts in India to skirt US sanctions, a development that could hurt India’s ties with Western partners wary of technology and weapons falling into the hands of Moscow.】

item.title: 帕内塔称欧洲央行利率必须降至中性水平才能促进经济增长
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧洲中央银行应将利率下调到足以确保其不再制约经济增长的程度。【原文：The European Central Bank should cut interest rates far enough to ensure they are no longer constraining economic growth, Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said.】

item.title: 美国将资助芯片 "数字双胞胎 "中心以削减研发成本
item.description: 美国计划向一个新的半导体研究中心拨款 2.85 亿美元，重点研究数字孪生技术，目标是将芯片开发的成本和时间降低约三分之一。【原文：The US plans to award $285 million to a new semiconductor research center focused on digital twin technology, with the goal of reducing the cost and time of chip development by roughly a third.】

item.title: 欧洲央行埃尔德森警告自然退化带来通胀风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）表示，欧洲中央银行必须考虑到自然破坏所带来的风险，这一过程可能会像气候变化一样引发通货膨胀。【原文：The European Central Bank must account for risks stemming from damage to nature, a process that could feed inflation in the same way that climate change does, according to Executive Board member Frank Elderson.】

item.title: 乌克兰在俄罗斯实施首次 ATACMS 打击：乌克兰 RBC
item.description: 据 RBC Ukraine 援引乌克兰军方一名官员的话报道，乌克兰武装部队使用 ATACMS 导弹对俄罗斯境内的一个边境地区进行了首次打击。【原文：Ukrainian armed forces carried out their first strike in a border region within Russian territory with a ATACMS missile, RBC Ukraine reports, citing an official in the nation’s military.】

item.title: 基金经理英伟达最看好的英国蓝筹股之一
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）、英国保诚集团（Prudential Plc）和英国中央电力公司（Centrica Plc）是今年表现最差的 25 只英国蓝筹股之一，不过对于 Invesco Asset Management 基金经理马丁-沃克（Martin Walker）来说，这些公司估值的下降带来了机遇。【原文：BP Plc, Prudential Plc and Centrica Plc are among the 25 worst-performing UK blue chips this year, though for Invesco Asset Management fund manager Martin Walker, their reduced valuations present opportunity.】

item.title: 中国清理债务后，大型建筑项目的现金减少
item.description: 中国推动改善资金短缺的地方财政状况，这意味着这些地方用于大型基础设施项目的资金将减少，因为出售新的地方政府特别债券的资金首次被用于偿还旧贷款。【原文：China’s push to improve the finances of cash-strapped localities will mean they have less money to spend on big infrastructure projects because for the first time funds from the sale of new local government special bonds are being used to repay old loans.】

item.title: 俄罗斯核理论推动债券跳水
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京签署了允许该国扩大使用原子武器的最新核军备理论之后，政府债券与日元和其他避险资产一同飙升。【原文：Government bonds surged along with the yen and other haven assets after Russian President Vladimir Putin signed an updated nuclear arms doctrine that allows the country to expand its use of atomic weapons.】

item.title: 华为人工智能产品受美国限制，中国芯片进展受阻
item.description: 由于美国的制裁，华为技术有限公司为人工智能和智能手机制造更强大芯片的雄心壮志遭遇重大挫折，使中国为与美国技术相匹敌而做出的重大努力停滞不前。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s ambitions to create more powerful chips for AI and smartphones have hit major snags because of US sanctions, stalling a major Chinese effort to match American technology.】

item.title: 俄罗斯推进核理论警告向西方示好
item.description: 在美国有限度地允许乌克兰对俄罗斯领土实施远程导弹袭击几天后，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京周二批准了一项更新的核理论，允许俄罗斯扩大原子武器的使用范围。【原文：President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday approved an updated nuclear doctrine that allows Russia to expand its use of atomic weapons, days after the US gave Ukraine limited permission for long-range missile strikes on Russian territory.】

item.title: 中国《国家安全法》如何改变香港
item.description: 2019 年，支持民主的抗议活动震撼了香港，此后中国大陆加强了对香港的控制，对这个前英国殖民地实施了一项广泛的国家安全法。此后，包括前媒体大亨黎智英（Jimmy Lai）在内的数十名反对派人士在候审期间被监禁。2024 年 11 月，40 多人被定罪判刑。新闻机构被关闭，教师受到处分。国家主席习近平明确表示他的目标：香港应掌握在 "爱国者 "手中。【原文：After pro-democracy protests rocked Hong Kong in 2019, mainland China tightened its grip by imposing a broad national security law on the former British colony. Since then, dozens of opposition figures — including former media tycoon Jimmy Lai — have been jailed while awaiting trial. More than 40 people were later convicted and sentenced in November 2024. News outlets have been shut and teachers disciplined. President Xi Jinping has made his aim clear: Hong Kong should be in the hands of “patrio】
